title: directx error
body:
league wont open because of this annoying ass directx error, no idea how to fix it, googled fixes and tried deleting the files that was recommended to fix, reinstalled league, i just don't know what to do

nvidia gtx 890
windows 10

never has done this hlelp

replies.body: well, i've tried every suggestion, even made a ticket, and live session, but not a single thing has worked.

I've started seeing this directx error popping up a little more often lately. Some of our players have noticed that the issue started when they updated to the WIndows 10 Creator update, which I believe is still technically in beta. You may be able to get around this by reverting to the most recent stable build of Windows, but let's go ahead and try double checking the steps in [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as well.

EDIT: Looks like I was a bit out of touch with how far the Creator Update had come. I would not actually recommend reverting now that Creator is an official release.

My computer was told I needed to upgrade to the Creator update. Based on everything I can find, it is now in full release and no longer in beta.

Further more, there are some critical security fixes that were included in the Creator update that prevents your computer from being compromised. Recommending users to revert to a less secure system that leaves them open to random-ware may not be the best choice for their computer's safety.
Perform the steps in the article Broporo provided, let's attempt to fix this without a revert.

I have tried all of the internet "fix's" none of them work. 

I have an AMD Radeon R9 290

I found reinstalling an old out of date driver soft ware to fix it.... As it would give me this error with the last update of my driver update...

I have NOT updated my driver, now i get this problem with DX again... I updated driver.... Still have problem...

Hope my info helps, i seem to be stuck.

I am getting the exact same error.
I am running Windows 10, creator update, with a GTX 750 Ti and the 381.89 nVidia drivers, which I cannot update as there are issues with the most current drivers.

I installed the game the night before on 7.10.
